post.body: Happy birthday!
Sorry... Didn't say it was awesome tasting. I said it wasn't that bad, and it isn't if you compare it to some cough medicine. lol
Nah the ones in his bedroom attached to the computer. If the ones in the living room died that would be a sad day for sure!
hmmm. Make him lay off the garlic and beans and the gas mask won't be necessary.
Ah damn it'll make your ass shrivel and for guys their balls will crawl inside and never come out! Burrrrrrrrrrrrrr!
We've had the good Mexican place already, but no Woody. FYI folks that really is the name of a sandwich.
Don't forget the sunflower seeds, sprouts, and a side of tofu wrapped hummus. Oh yeah, and it all must, must, be organic! *grin*
Something to do with the ho's fucking car! LOLLOL!
I feel your pain, and I'm trying to work over here and the fucking natives next door are having some sort of tribal uprising!
And I'm on pacific time so that sucks even more cuz I dont have my 3 hours. lol
Certainly not me. Just kill me now please? and this woman's voice sucks some serious ass!
Oh how cool! That will be so awesome for her and Jack. Yay! Keep me posted.
And you look damn hot too! Ooops did I post that so all could see? Sure did! Think I'll leave it that way. *smirk*
Good luck. It don't snow enough either place. lol
Awwwww! Don't be a scruge! *smiles* No tinsel for you!
hehehe too funny! I'm sure you can, and you're not one of the offenders but it was stil a necessary comment. *smile*
Lots of times those are actually adults. Just depends.
Yeah makes sense. I'm thinking I will likely have the same problem when I start listing all my shit for moving out there.
Someone may have said something you want to save or put a site in a post... Actually reason is pretty logical.
Hm. Blind people watching ballet... Never quite understood that one... I mean you get nothing out of it unless someone falls.
That's awesome that if you both had to be alone that you were able to keep each other company.
Awwwww! Hughug! I hope you feel better soon!
Awwww! I feel your pain! Happy Bday btw. I'm over here trying to type with cold hands.
hahahaha too funny! No doubt with all the work you've had those beers are necessary!
Yeah that day the three of us went downtown...
Oh God! Chocolate cheesecake? Yummyyyyy!
Actually I thought she was around once while I was out this last time but she ran out or something...?
Mmmmmm me please? Hahahahahahahaha! We're lacking in good delivery for that sort of thing here.
I hope this all works out ok. What a cool Christmas gift for your sis! Congrats to her!
Hey from sick ville. Hope you have an awesome Christmas and a great time with your son!
Hey get that thing and c'mon out here and maybe we can find some.
Join the club. I don't do well with that either. Just ask Doug. hahahhaha
My God! Glad you're ok. I hope that falling thing isn't contageous. Ice and me don't get along either.
Flew with a cold and now my ears are both clogged and hurt like hell. Guess instead of working 2day it'll be doctor for me. Oh joy...
Back from dinner. Had my fil of cheesy Christmas music for the night. Now off to work I go. 2hours on coffee due by 1PM.
Ding, dong the bitch is back! Which bitch? The transcription bitch! not done with 2hr from 2day&have 1hr due 9AMPST.
My bad. Forgot not everyone's lucky enough to have both a fantastic guy and a life.
Doing this file about alfalfa seed growing and this dued is as dumb as a box of hair! OMG! I wonder from which hickified land he's from?
35f at 4:00 & this morning was in the teens. God I wish I were back in Sac! Not to be confused with "in the sack."
Just woke up after like the longest nap in history. Think this cold crap's finally getting better though. ear infections aren't healed yet.
